targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(date,$__interval),
  sum(cost) AS "cost"
FROM google_campaign_report
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(date) AND
  platform in($Platform) AND 
  campaign_type in($Type) AND 
  brandorproduct in($BrandProduct) AND
  campaign in($Campaign)

panels.description: An action that's counted when someone interacts with your ad (for example, clicks a text ad or views a video ad) and then takes an action that you’ve defined as valuable to your business, such as an online purchase or a call to your business from a mobile phone.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(date,$__interval),
  sum(conversions_value) AS "conversions"
FROM google_conversion_campaign_report
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(date) AND
  platform in($Platform) AND 
  campaign_type in($Type) AND 
  brandorproduct in($BrandProduct) AND
  campaign in($Campaign) AND 
  conversion_action_category in($ConversionCategory) AND
  conversion_action_name in($ConversionAction)

panels.title: Conversion Value

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(date,$__interval),
  sum(clicks) AS "clicks"
FROM google_campaign_report
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(date) AND
  platform in($Platform) AND 
  campaign_type in($Type) AND 
  brandorproduct in($BrandProduct) AND
  campaign in($Campaign)

panels.content: Google Statistics - Campaign View

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(date,$__interval),
  sum(cost) AS "cost",
  name
FROM google_campaign_report
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(date) AND
  platform in($Platform) AND 
  campaign_type in($Type) AND 
  brandorproduct in($BrandProduct) AND
  campaign in($Campaign)
GROUP BY 1, name
ORDER BY date

panels.description: Conversion value is a measure of the value of all the conversions given a self defined value metric

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(date,$__interval),
  sum(conversions_value) AS "conversions_value",
  name
FROM google_conversion_campaign_report
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(date) AND
  platform in($Platform) AND 
  campaign_type in($Type) AND 
  brandorproduct in($BrandProduct) AND
  campaign in($Campaign) AND 
  conversion_action_category in($ConversionCategory) AND
  conversion_action_name in($ConversionAction)
GROUP BY 1, name
ORDER BY $__timeGroup(date,$__interval)

panels.title: Conversion Value - Campaign Level

targets.rawSql:
WITH conversions as (
  SELECT
    date, name, sum(conversions) as "conversions"
  FROM google_conversion_campaign_report
  WHERE 
    platform in($Platform) AND 
    campaign_type in($Type) AND 
    brandorproduct in($BrandProduct) AND
    campaign in($Campaign) AND
    conversion_action_category in($ConversionCategory) AND
    conversion_action_name in($ConversionAction)
  GROUP BY name, date),
cost AS (
  SELECT name, date, sum(cost) as "cost"
  FROM google_campaign_report
  WHERE 
    $__timeFilter(date) AND
    platform in($Platform) AND 
    campaign_type in($Type) AND 
    brandorproduct in($BrandProduct) AND
    campaign in($Campaign)
    GROUP BY name, date)
SELECT 
  $__timeGroupAlias(conversions.date,$__interval),
  conversions / cost AS "cpa",
  conversions.name
FROM conversions LEFT JOIN cost 
ON conversions.name = cost.name AND conversions.date = cost.date
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(conversions.date)
GROUP BY 1, name

WITH conversions as (
  SELECT
    date, name, sum(conversions_value) as "conversions_value"
  FROM google_conversion_campaign_report
  WHERE 
    platform in($Platform) AND 
    campaign_type in($Type) AND 
    brandorproduct in($BrandProduct) AND
    campaign in($Campaign) AND
    conversion_action_category in($ConversionCategory) AND
    conversion_action_name in($ConversionAction)
  GROUP BY name, date),
cost AS (
  SELECT name, date, sum(cost) as "cost"
  FROM google_campaign_report
  WHERE 
    $__timeFilter(date) AND
    platform in($Platform) AND 
    campaign_type in($Type) AND 
    brandorproduct in($BrandProduct) AND
    campaign in($Campaign)
    GROUP BY name, date)
SELECT 
  $__timeGroupAlias(conversions.date,$__interval),
  conversions_value / cost AS "roas",
  conversions.name
FROM conversions LEFT JOIN cost 
ON conversions.name = cost.name AND conversions.date = cost.date
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(conversions.date)
GROUP BY 1, name

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(date,$__interval),
  sum(clicks) AS "clicks",
  name
FROM google_campaign_report
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(date) AND
  platform in($Platform) AND 
  campaign_type in($Type) AND 
  brandorproduct in($BrandProduct) AND
  campaign in($Campaign) 
GROUP BY 1, name
ORDER BY date

panels.description: How often your ad is shown. An impression is counted each time your ad is shown on a search result page or other site on the Google Network.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(date,$__interval),
  sum(Impressions) AS "Impressions",
  name
FROM google_campaign_report
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(date) AND
  platform in($Platform) AND 
  campaign_type in($Type) AND 
  brandorproduct in($BrandProduct) AND
  campaign in($Campaign)
GROUP BY 1, name
ORDER BY date

panels.title: Impressions

panels.description: A ratio showing how often people who see your ad end up clicking it. Clickthrough rate (CTR) can be used to gauge how well your keywords and ads are performing.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(date,$__interval),
  avg(ctr) AS "ctr",
  name
FROM google_campaign_report
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(date) AND
  platform in($Platform) AND 
  campaign_type in($Type) AND 
  brandorproduct in($BrandProduct) AND
  campaign in($Campaign)
GROUP BY 1, name
ORDER BY date

panels.title: CTR

panels.content: Google Statistics - Conversion Value View

panels.description: An action that's counted when someone interacts with your ad (for example, clicks a text ad or views a video ad) and then takes an action that you’ve defined as valuable to your business, such as an online purchase or a call to your business from a mobile phone.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(date,$__interval),
  conversions as "conversions",
  conversion_action_name
FROM google_conversion_campaign_report
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(date) AND
  platform in($Platform) AND 
  campaign_type in($Type) AND 
  brandorproduct in($BrandProduct) AND
  campaign in($Campaign) AND 
  conversion_action_category in($ConversionCategory) AND 
  conversion_action_name in($ConversionAction)
GROUP BY 1, conversion_action_name
ORDER BY date

panels.title: Conversion Goals

panels.description: Conversion Value is a measure of the value of all the conversions given a self defined value metric

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(date,$__interval),
  conversions_value as "conversions_value",
  conversion_action_name
FROM google_conversion_campaign_report
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(date) AND
  platform in($Platform) AND 
  campaign_type in($Type) AND 
  brandorproduct in($BrandProduct) AND
  campaign in($Campaign) AND 
  conversion_action_category in($ConversionCategory) AND 
  conversion_action_name in($ConversionAction)
GROUP BY 1, conversion_action_name
ORDER BY date

panels.title: Conversion Value

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(date,$__interval),
  sum(clicks) AS "clicks",
  device
FROM google_device_campaign_report
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(date) AND
  platform in($Platform) AND 
  campaign_type in($Type) AND 
  brandorproduct in($BrandProduct) AND
  campaign in($Campaign)
GROUP BY device
ORDER BY clicks DESC;

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(date,$__interval),
  sum(cost) AS "cost",
  name
FROM google_campaign_report
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(date)
GROUP BY name
ORDER BY cost DESC;

panels.description: Conversion value of all types of conversions

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(date,$__interval),
  sum(conversions_value) AS "conversions_value",
  name
FROM google_conversion_campaign_report
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(date)
GROUP BY name
ORDER BY conversions_value DESC;

panels.title: Conversion value on campaigns

list.definition: SELECT DISTINCT campaign_type FROM output.google_campaign_report WHERE platform in($Platform)
list.name: Type
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT campaign_type FROM output.google_campaign_report WHERE platform in($Platform)

list.definition: SELECT DISTINCT brandorproduct FROM output.google_campaign_report WHERE platform in($Platform) AND campaign_type in($Type)
list.name: BrandProduct
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT brandorproduct FROM output.google_campaign_report WHERE platform in($Platform) AND campaign_type in($Type)

list.definition: SELECT DISTINCT campaign FROM output.google_campaign_report WHERE platform in($Platform) AND campaign_type in($Type) AND brandorproduct in($BrandProduct)
list.name: Campaign
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT campaign FROM output.google_campaign_report WHERE platform in($Platform) AND campaign_type in($Type) AND brandorproduct in($BrandProduct)

list.definition: SELECT DISTINCT conversion_action_name FROM output.google_conversion_campaign_report WHERE conversion_action_category in($ConversionCategory)
list.name: ConversionAction
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT conversion_action_name FROM output.google_conversion_campaign_report WHERE conversion_action_category in($ConversionCategory)
